title: Animal Fury
description: Gain a bite attack

title: Armor Ripper
description: Gain a bonus to Sunder checks with your natural attacks while raging

title: Auspicious Mark
description: Gain a bonus on a roll once per rage

title: Battle Roar
description: You deal an additional 1d6 points of sonic damage to an opponent you successfully demoralized using intimidating glare.

title: Beast Totem
description: Gain a natural armor bonus

title: Beast Totem, Greater
description: Gain a pounce attack

title: Beast Totem, Lesser
description: Gain two claw attacks

title: Bestial Climber
description: Climb at your normal land speed while raging

title: Bestial Leaper
description: Take a standard action while moving during a rage

title: Bestial Swimmer
description: Swim at your normal land speed while raging

title: Bleeding Blow
description: Deal bleed damage with your powerful blows

title: Boar's Charge
description: Automatically score critical hits with your gore attack while raging

title: Boasting Taunt
description: Force an enemy to attack the barbarian

title: Body Bludgeon
description: Beat a foe with another creature

title: Brawler
description: Gain Improved Unarmed Strike while raging

title: Brawler, Greater
description: Gain Two-Weapon Fighting while raging

title: Breathtaker
description: While raging, whenever you make a successful melee attack against an opponent that is holding its breath, in addition to any other effects caused by that attack, the opponent loses a number of rounds of breath equal to your Strength modifier.

title: Celestial Totem
description: Gain a halo that shines as daylight and triggers invisibility purge (only reveals non-good creatures) in the barbarian's square and each adjacent square.

title: Celestial Totem, Greater
description: Gain SR while raging equal to 11 + barbarian class level against spells with the evil descriptor; also gain +2 bonus on all saves against spells and effects from evil creatures.

title: Celestial Totem, Lesser
description: Whenever subjected to a spell that cures hp damage, heal 1 additional hp per caster level. In the case of non-spell healing effects (such as channeled energy or lay on hands), heal a number of additional hp equal to the class level of the character performing the magical healing.

title: Chaos Totem
description: Gain a bonus to Escape Artist and a chance to avoid critical hits

title: Chaos Totem, Greater
description: Gain DR/lawful and weapons count as chaotic

title: Chaos Totem, Lesser
description: Gain a deflection bonus to AC and a resistance bonus against lawful spells and creatures

title: Clear Mind
description: Reroll a failed Will save

title: Come and Get Me
description: Provoke attacks of opportunity to get extra attacks

title: Crippling Blow
description: Deal Strength or Dexterity damage with your powerful blows

title: Deadly Accuracy
description: Deal double crit damage when using surprise accuracy

title: Deathless Frenzy
description: Ignore all consequences of being at 0 or lower hit points for one round while raging

title: Disemboweling Tusks
description: While raging, deal Con damage when you confirm a critical hit with your gore attack

title: Disruptive
description: Gain the Disruptive feat as a bonus feat

title: Dragon Totem
description: Gain bonuses while raging

title: Dragon Totem Resilience
description: Gain energy resistance while raging

title: Dragon Totem Wings
description: Gain wings and a fly speed while raging

title: Eater of Magic
description: Take a second saving throw and gain temp hp

title: Elemental Rage
description: Deal extra elemental damage with melee attacks

title: Elemental Rage, Greater
description: Deal extra elemental damage on critical hits with melee weapons

title: Elemental Rage, Lesser
description: Use a swift action to cause extra elemental damage with melee attacks

title: Energy Absorption
description: Absorb energy to gain temporary hit points

title: Energy Eruption
description: Store absorbed energy and release it as a breath weapon attack

title: Energy Resistance
description: Gain resistance to one type of elemental damage

title: Energy Resistance, Greater
description: Halve damage from an elemental attack

title: Fearless Rage
description: Become immune to the shaken and frightened conditions

title: Ferocious Beast
description: Your animal companion also gains the benefits of rage though you must spend 1 additional round of rage per round if companion begins or ends its turn adjacent to you, and 2 additional rounds of rage per round if not.

title: Ferocious Beast, Greater
description: Your animal companion shares the benefits of your rage powers that are constant in effect but gains no benefit from rage powers that require actions to activate, even if they are free actions.

title: Ferocious Mount
description: Allow your mount to rage as well

title: Ferocious Mount, Greater
description: Allow your mount to benefit from rage powers

title: Ferocious Trample
description: While raging your mount gains the trample ability

title: Ferocious Trample, Greater
description: Your mount can trample larger creatures and make overrun attacks while raging

title: Fiend Totem
description: Attackers take damage when they hit you in melee

title: Fiend Totem, Greater
description: Non-evil creatures adjacent to the barbarian take damage and are shaken

title: Fiend Totem, Lesser
description: Gain a gore attack

title: Fierce Fortitude
description: You gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against diseases and poison. A skald must be trained in Intimidate to select this rage power.

title: Flesh Wound
description: Convert lethal damage to nonlethal damage

title: Fueled by Vengeance
description: Gain an extra round of rage if you hit a creature that hit you this round while raging

title: Gearbreaker
description: Once per round while raging, whenever you make an attack against a construct, you can ignore an amount of that construct's hardness equal to your barbarian level. This ability must be used before the attack roll is made. This power stacks with hard hitter.

title: Ghost Rager
description: Deal normal damage to incorporeal creatures

title: Good for What Ails You
description: Drink alcohol to gain a new save against conditions

title: Greater Animal Fury
description: As animal fury, but your bite attack deals damage as if you were one size larger.

title: Ground Breaker
description: Attack the ground to create difficult terrain

title: Ground Breaker, Greater
description: Extend ground breaker's radius of difficult terrain

title: Guarded Life
description: Stabilize when at negative hit points

title: Guarded Life, Greater
description: Convert more damage to nonlethal damage

title: Guarded Stance
description: Gain a dodge bonus to AC

title: Hive Totem
description: Take half damage from swarms while raging

title: Hive Totem Resilience
description: Take no damage from swarms while raging

title: Hive Totem Toxicity
description: Do Constitution damage with a bite while raging

title: Hurling
description: Increase the range and size allowed for a hurled object

title: Hurling, Greater
description: Increase the range and size allowed for a hurled object

title: Hurling, Lesser
description: You can lift and throw large objects to do damage

title: Hurling Charge
description: You can hurl an object as part of a charge

title: Impelling Disarm
description: Once per rage, you may attempt to hit another opponent with a weapon you disarmed from a different opponent.

title: Increased Damage Reduction
description: Gain DR/- while raging

title: Inspire Ferocity
description: Use a move action to share reckless abandon with allies

title: Internal Fortitude
description: Gain immunity to nauseated and sickened conditions

title: Intimidating Glare
description: Intimidate an opponent as a move action

title: Knockback
description: Make a bull rush in place of a melee attack

title: Knockdown
description: Make a trip attack in place of a melee attack

title: Lethal Accuracy
description: Deal more damage when you score a critical hit with surprise accuracy

title: Linnorm Death Curse, Cairn
description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of negative energy damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of decay (Will negates).

title: Linnorm Death Curse, Crag
description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of fire damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of fire (Will negates).

title: Linnorm Death Curse, Fjord
description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of cold damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of drowning (Will negates).

title: Linnorm Death Curse, Ice
description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of cold damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed, the attacker suffers the curse of frost.

title: Linnorm Death Curse, Taiga
description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of electricity damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of electricity (Will negates).

title: Linnorm Death Curse, Tarn
description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of acid damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of death (Will negates).

title: Linnorm Death Curse, Tor
description: Your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of fire damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of boiling blood (Will negates).

title: Liquid Courage
description: Alcoholic beverages give you a morale bonus while raging

title: Low-Light Vision
description: Gain low-light vision while raging

title: Mighty Swing
description: Automatically confirm a critical hit

title: Moment of Clarity
description: Remove benefits and penalties of raging for 1 round

title: Night Vision
description: Gain darkvision 60 ft while raging

title: No Escape
description: Double move as an immediate action when an opponent withdraws

title: Overbearing Advance
description: Deal extra damage when using the overrun maneuver

title: Overbearing Onslaught
description: Overrun multiple targets per round

title: Penetrating Bite
description: When using animal fury while raging, your bite is able to pierce most resistances.

title: Perfect Clarity
description: Roll twice when disbelieving an illusion

title: Powerful Blow
description: Deal extra damage with a single blow

title: Primal Scent
description: Gain a bonus when using scent

title: Quick Reflexes
description: Make additional attacks of opportunity while raging

title: Raging Climber
description: Gain a bonus on Climb checks while raging

title: Raging Flier
description: 1/rage, fly up to your base speed as a move action and can use this flight as part of movement during a charge.

title: Raging Grappler
description: While raging, whenever you succeed at a check to start a grapple, you can choose to deal damage as if you had also succeeded at a check to maintain the grapple. In addition, while raging, whenever you succeed at a combat maneuver check to maintain a grapple, you can choose to give yourself, the target of your grapple, or both the prone condition as a free action while continuing to maintain the grapple.

title: Raging Leaper
description: Gain a bonus on Acrobatics checks to jump while raging

title: Raging Swimmer
description: Gain a bonus on Swim checks while raging

title: Reckless Abandon
description: Take a penalty to AC for extra accuracy while raging

title: Reflexive Dodge
description: Use your rolling dodge bonus on Reflex saving throws

title: Regenerative Vigor
description: Gain fast healing after using renewed vigor

title: Renewed Life
description: Ignore temporary negative levels while raging

title: Renewed Vigor
description: Heal damage as a standard action

title: Renewed Vitality
description: Ignore ability damage or penalties while raging

title: Roaring Drunk
description: Gain a bonus on Intimidate checks and fear effect DC

title: Rolling Dodge
description: Gain a dodge bonus to AC against ranged attacks while raging

title: Roused Anger
description: Enter a rage even when fatigued

title: Savage Dirty Trick
description: Once per round while raging, you can attempt a dirty trick combat maneuver in place of a melee attack.

title: Savage Intuition
description: You may enter a rage even if you aren't aware that combat has begun

title: Savage Jaw
description: While raging, you can open your jaws wide and latch your teeth firmly onto your opponent.

title: Scent
description: Gain the scent ability when raging

title: Sharpened Accuracy
description: Surprise accuracy ignores concealment and cover

title: Smasher
description: When sundering an unattended object, ignore hardness

title: Spell Sunder
description: Sunder spells with a combat maneuver check

title: Spellbreaker
description: Gain the Spellbreaker feat while raging

title: Spirit Steed
description: Your mount gains DR/magic and its natural weapons count as magical

title: Spirit Totem
description: Attacks against you may miss when you are raging

title: Spirit Totem, Greater
description: Enemies near you take negative energy damage

title: Spirit Totem, Lesser
description: Gain spirit allies that can attack adjacent enemies

title: Sprint
description: Move at x3 or x6 speed once per rage

title: Staggering Drunk
description: Gain dodge AC against attacks of opportunity if drinking

title: Strength Surge
description: Gain a Strength bonus on Combat Maneuver Checks

title: Sunder Enchantment
description: Suppress sundered magical item's powers

title: Superstition
description: Gain a bonus on saving throws

title: Surprise Accuracy
description: Gain a morale bonus on one attack roll

title: Swift Foot
description: Move faster when raging

title: Terrifying Howl
description: Cause shaken enemies to become panicked

title: Ultimate Clarity
description: 1/rage, for 1 round, see through normal and magical darkness (including from magical effects such as blur and displacement), invisibility, and illusions; and discern exact locations of creatures with concealment.

title: Unexpected Strike
description: Enemies provoke attacks of opportunity even when they normally wouldn't

title: Water Sense
description: Your senses are no longer fooled by the rippling surface and confounding reflections seen in water that is being used as cover by your foes.

title: Witch Hunter
description: Do extra damage against spellcasters

title: World Serpent Totem
description: Gain bonuses against outsiders and abberations

title: World Serpent Spirit
description: Your weapon counts as chaotic, evil, good, lawful while raging

title: World Serpent Totem Unity
description: Double fast movement bonus and cannot be knocked prone
